Posts.Content: Hi! I just wanted to inform everyone that Living Beyond Breast Cancer is holding a free teleconference: Get Moving with the Latest Research on Diet and Nutrition on Wednesday, September 17, 2008 from 12:00 p.m. to 1:30 p.m. Dr. Rowan Chlebowski is going to be the speaker and he is going to discuss pratical ways to integrate healful practices into your day-to-day lifestyle along with popular breast cancer diet questions and much more! Check out the full story at www.lbbc.org.
Posts.Title: Free Nutrition Teleconference
